Structure# CAShapeLayerLineCap

iOS 3.0+iPadOS 3.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.6+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
struct CAShapeLayerLineCap
```

## [Topics](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap#topics)

[`init(rawValue: String)`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap/init(rawvalue:))### [Type Properties](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap#Type-Properties)

[`static let butt: CAShapeLayerLineCap`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap/butt)Specifies a butt line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.[`static let round: CAShapeLayerLineCap`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap/round)Specifies a round line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.[`static let square: CAShapeLayerLineCap`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap/square)Specifies a square line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.## [Relationships](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinecap#relationships)
